duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform Environmental monitoring in the general manufacturing environment, requiring clean room gowning and sampling.
Assist with the setup of the EM laboratory and manage the EM lab daily operations.
Incubate and enumerate organisms on cultured media and provide EM data support.
Assist with autoclaving supplies in the lab and participate in required hazardous waste training.
Maintain focus on detail-oriented, repetitive tasks and keep accurate records.
Interact with peers and members of other departments in team settings in a professional manner.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or GED required. Bachelor’s degree in Microbiology or closely related field preferred.
